name: UtranCellTDDHcr
description: UMTS Time Division Duplex (TDD) high chip rate (HCR) radio cell resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: cId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Identifier of a cell in one RNC ('C-ID' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: localCellId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Uniquely identify a cell in a Node B ('Local Cell ID' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: maximumTransmissionPower
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Maximum power for all downlink channels ('Maximum Transmission Power' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: cellMode
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Identifies the cell mode

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: pichPower
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Power of the PICH channel in the cell ('PICH Power' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: pchPower
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: PCH transport channel in the cell ('PCH Power' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: fachPower
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Maximum power of FACH transport channel ('Max FACH Power' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: lac
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Location Area Code (LAC) (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: rac
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Routing Area Code (RAC) (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sac
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Service Area Code (SAC) (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: uraList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: UTRAN Registration Area identities ('URA identity' in 3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: utranCellIubLink
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Distinguished Name (DN) of IubLink

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: relatedAntennaList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Distinguished Names (DN) of AntennaFunction(s) (3GPP 28.662)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: relatedTmaList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Distinguished Names (DN) of ('TmaFunction' in 3GPP 28.662)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: operationalState
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Operational state describes whether physically installed and working or not (ITU-T X.731)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hsFlag
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: High-Speed Downlink Packet Access (HSDPA) supported flag

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hsEnable
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: High-Speed Downlink Packet Access (HSDPA) enabled flag

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: numOfHspdschs
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: In FDD the number of codes, in TDD the number of HS-PDSCHs (3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: numOfHsscchs
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Number of HS-SCCHs for one cell (3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: frameOffset
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Required offset in neighbouring cells monitoring (3GPP 25.423)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: cellIndividualOffset
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Relevant for hand over (HO) decision (3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hcsPrio
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Hierarchical cell structure (HCS) priority in cell (re)selection (3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: maximumAllowedUlTxPower
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Maximum allowed uplink transmit power in cell (re)selection (3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: snaInformation
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of Shared Networks Access Control (SNAC) (3GPP 25.423)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: qrxlevMin
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Minimum required RX level in cell (re)selection ('QrxlevMin' in 3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: deltaQrxlevmin
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Delta required RX level in cell (re)selection ('DeltaQrxlevmin' in 3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: qhcs
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Quality threshold levels in cell (re)selection ('Qhcs' in 3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: penaltyTime
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Penalty time duration in cell (re)selection ('Penalty_time' in 3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: referenceTimeDifferenceToCell
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Reference time difference to cell in neighbouring cells monitoring (3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: readSFNIndicator
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Read SFN indicator in neighbouring cells monitoring (3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nsPlmnIdList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of unique identities for PLMN

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: restrictionStateIndicator
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates if cell reserved for operator use in Cell Access Control (3GPP 25.423)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: dpcModechangeSupportIndicator
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates support for DPC mode change in Power Control (3GPP 25.423)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: relatedSectorEquipment
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Distinguished Name (DN) of sector equipment ('relatedSectorEquipment' in 3GPP 28.662)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: uarfcn
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: UTRA absolute radio frequency channel number (UARFCN) (3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: cellParameterId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Unambiguously identifies the cell ('Cell Parameter ID' in TS 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: primaryCcpchPower
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Power of the primary CCPCH channel ('PCCPCH Power' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: cellCapabilityContainerTDD
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Bitfield indicating support of particular functionality (3GPP 25.423)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sctdIndicator
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates whether SCTD is used ('SCDT Indicator' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: dpchConstantValue
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Power margin used by a UE ('DPCH Constant Valuer' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: temporaryOffset1
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Offset applied to hierarchical cell structure (HCS) in cell (re)selection (3GPP 25.331)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: syncCase
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: SCH and PCCPCH mapped on one or two downlink slots per frame ('Synch Case' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: timeSlotForSch
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Time interval assigned to a physical channel for SCH ('SCH Time Slot' in 3GPP 25.433)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: schTimeSlot
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: First time slot assigned to the Physical Channel SCH ('SCH Time Slot' in TS 25.433 )

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: timeSlotHCRList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Defines the time slot configuration information (3GPP 25.433)
